_instructions: This file is a template for human annotation of commitments.
For each session_id, read the full transcript and fill in the commitments array.
See DEFINITION.md for what counts as a commitment and how to fill each field.
who       - Speaker label (SPEAKER_ME, SPEAKER_OTHER_1) or resolved name
deadline  - Exact words from transcript, or null if none
quote     - Verbatim quote from transcript containing the commitment
uncertain - true if the commitment is weak/hedged (optional, default false)
conditional - true if depends on a condition (optional, default false)
1. Run: python3 -c "import sqlite3; c=sqlite3.connect('data/calls.db'); print(c.execute('SELECT transcript FROM calls WHERE session_id=?', ('SESSION_ID',)).fetchone()[0])"
